description.en: Increases your Health Points (HP) by +600 and your Attack Power (ATK) by +300 for one hour.
description.ar: Increases your Health Points (HP) by +600 and your Attack Power (ATK) by +300 for one hour.
description.br: Acrescenta +600 de vida (HP) e +300 de Ataque (ATQ) por uma hora.
description.fi: Increases your Health Points (HP) by +600 and your Attack Power (ATK) by +300 for one hour.
description.fil: Increases your Health Points (HP) by +600 and your Attack Power (ATK) by +300 for one hour.
description.fr: Vous octroie PV Max +600 et Attaque +300 pendant une heure.
description.id: Meningkatkan Health Points (HP) sebesar +600 dan Attack Power (ATK) sebesar +300 selama satu jam.
description.it: Increases your Health Points (HP) by +600 and your Attack Power (ATK) by +300 for one hour.
description.jp: 1時間、最大HPが+450、攻撃力が+300増加します。
description.kr: 1시간 동안 체력이 +600, 공격력이 +300 증가합니다. 다 사용하면 충전된 파워 스크롤이 됩니다.
description.nl: Increases your Health Points (HP) by +600 and your Attack Power (ATK) by +300 for one hour.

description.sp: Aumenta tus Puntos de Salud (HP) en +600 y tu Poder de Ataque (ATK) en +300 durante una hora.

description.th: เพิ่มคะแนนสุขภาพ (HP) ของคุณ +600 และพลังโจมตี (ATK) ของคุณ +300 เป็นเวลาหนึ่งชั่วโมง
description.vi: Tăng Điểm máu (HP) của bạn lên +600 và Sức mạnh Công kích (ATK) của bạn lên +300 trong một giờ.
